sourcesContent:
pipes


date normal: {{date | date}}

format date: {{date | date:'MM/dd/YYYY'}}

number pipe: {{amount | number}}

format number pipe: {{amount | number:'1.2-2'}}

currency pipe: {{amount | currency:'USD':'symbol-narrow'}}

percent pipe: {{percent | percent}}

i18n select pipe: es un placer {{personNumbers | i18nSelect: personNumbersMap}}

i18n plural pipe: are you waiting for pillars? {{pillars.length | i18nPlural: pillarsMap}}

slice pipe: {{pillars | slice: 0:2}}

keyValue pipe:

  • hello my {{item.key}} is {{item.value}}

async pipe {{counterObservable | async}}
